name: Core Bouncer
description:
NOTE: There are currently an issue with the WEB-GL version:

The high-score does not work. This is an issue with itch.io not allowing non-SSL websites to be called. I will investigate new options for high-score services and update.

Core Bouncer is a four-paddle rotational game that was based on the classic game 'Pong'. Initially starting off as 'palette cleanser' whilst I was developing a multiplayer game in Unreal, Core Bouncer is the polished version of prototype developed in my junior skillset years. 

Note: This is prototype and may contain bugs.

Controls:

  • W: Rotate the paddles counter clockwise.
  • D: Rotate the paddles clockwise.
  • Left Shift: Turbo speed.
  • Esc: Pause game / Open menu (Press Esc to resume)

Credits:

Music generated by Mubert: https://mubert.com/render

Sound generated in BFXR: https://www.bfxr.net/

Fonts sourced from www.dafont.com:

  • https://www.dafont.com/square-sans-serif-7.font
  • https://www.dafont.com/poxel.font

2D Artwork, Programming, UI Design: VECTORinteractive
